item.title: I-90 West - Exit 370
item.description: I-90 west approaching Exit 370 - US-191/BL-90/Big Timber/Harlowton. Use Exit 370 for access to US-191 north. This sign should read TO US-191, as US-191 does not join intersect I-90 until Exit 367.

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 370
item.description: I-90 east at Exit 370 - Big Timber. This is the eastern end of the Big Timber business loop.

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 357
item.description: I-90 east approaching Exit 357 - BL-90/US-191 North/Big Timber/Harlowton. US-191 north leaves I-90 eastbound here. Westbound US-191 South joins I-90 to Bozeman.

item.title: BL-90 East/US-191 North at BL-90/US-191 Split
item.description: BL-90 East/US-191 North at BL-90/US-191 split. Merge right on BL-90 for Billings; merge left on US-191 for Harlowton.

item.title: US-191 North/BL-90 East - Split
item.description: US-191 North/BL-90 East at US-191/BL-90 split in Big Timber. This sign assembly is confusing, because it appears to be missing an arrow that points either to the left or straight for US-191. BL-90 merges off to the right towards I-90.

item.title: BL-90 East/US-191 North - MTS-298 Junction
item.description: BL-90 East/US-191 North at MTS-298 (McLeod St.) in Big Timber.

item.title: US-191 North/BL-90 East - Big Timber
item.description: Entering Big Timber on US-191 North/BL-90 East. Big Timber is the county seat of Sweet Grass County and is situated on the Yellowstone River.

item.title: US-191 North/BL-90 East at Frontage Road
item.description: US-191 North/BL-90 East at Frontage Road. Turn right to continue on US-191 North/BL-90 east to Big Timber and Harlowton.

item.title: US-191 North/BL-90 East at I-90 West/US-191 South Onramp
item.description: US-191 North/BL-90 East at I-90 West/US-191 South Onramp in Big Timber. US-191 south joins I-90 west to Bozeman.

item.title: US-191 North/BL-90 East at I-90 West
item.description: US-191 North/BL-90 East at I-90 west. Turn left on I-90 West/US-191 South for Butte; continue straight for US-191 North/BL-90 East to Big Timber.

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 362 Offramp - Big Timber
item.description: I-90 east on Exit 362 offramp in Big Timber. Turn left for BL-90 and to continue north on US-191 for Harlowton and Big Timber.

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 367
item.description: I-90 east at Exit 367 - US-191/BL-90/Big Timber/Harlowton. US-191 leaves I-90 eastbound here. Typically on a freeway junction assembly in Montana, the business loop shield is surrounded in a white box.

item.title: BL-90 West at US-191
item.description: Directional Sign at US-191 Juntion on BL-90 West
